title: Serena Williams looks stunning in the new SI Swimsuit edition | For The Win
text:
Serena Williams looks stunning in the new SI Swimsuit edition Serena Williams looks stunning in the new SI Swimsuit edition By Hemal Jhaveri February 16, 2017 3:43 pm Follow @hemjhaveri 561 shares Follow @hemjhaveri 
Serena Williams recently graced the pages of Sports Illustratedâ€™s Swimsuit Issue looking fierce in an array of swimwear. 
Of course one of the worldâ€™s greatest athletes also has one of the worldâ€™s greatest bodies. 
Proud fiancÃ© Alexis Ohanian added another photo of the tennis star looking incredible in a lime-green bikini on his Instagram page with a very simple and very accurate caption. A post shared by Alexis Ohanian ðŸ—½ (@alexisohanian) on Feb 16, 2017 at 10:02am PST 
She also posed in a red thongâ€¦ A post shared by Serena Williams (@serenawilliams) on Feb 15, 2017 at 9:46am PST

The greatest, indeed.
